Linear Equation in slope intercept form:
$$
y = mx + b
$$
Example:
$$
y = 20x + 17
$$
$m$ represents the slope
<br>
$b$ represents $y$ - intercept


```{r}
#R Code:

m <- 20
b <- 17

#slice_plot(m * x + b ~ x, domain(x = range(0, 10)))
```

```{r}
inputPanel(
 shiny::numericInput(inputId = "m", label = "m", value = m, step = 1),
 shiny::numericInput(inputId = "b", label = "b", value = b, step = 1)
)
```

```{r}
output$linear_plot <- renderPlot({
  #slice_plot(input$m * x + input$b ~ x, domain(x = range(0, 10)))
  plot(input$m, input$b)
})

plotOutput("linear_plot", height = "600px")
```
